data.title: If you like smoking establishments, this is a good one
data.text: We buy lottery tickets here. as a work group a few times a week.  it is not a tourist destination. There is a sign on the door that says if you are offended by smoke or smokers, don't come it.  that says it all.

data.title: If a pipe smoker you must visit!
data.text: Paul's Pipe shop is an institution.  It's been in business since 1928.  The display of pipes, from brand new to old classics still on their cards when pipes were more mainstream and sold everywhere.  The customer service is outstanding, and their pipe tobacco offerings is excellent.  Any pipe smokers out there MUST put this place on their list to visit.  As others mentioned it is like stepping back in time.

data.title: Like a museum for smokers
data.text:
I'm not a smoker... but I'm curious about the culture and history of bygone eras, and stepping into this place is like going back in time.  Smoking, of course, is allowed in this place, so be prepared for the smoke scent.  

If you are a pipe or cigar smoker... then you MUST visit this place... HUGE selection.
